title: The Great Thanksgiving : Musical Setting B

lyrics.text:
Holy, holy, holy, Lord, Holy, holy, holy, Lord, God of power and might. God of power and might.
Heaven and earth are full of your glory, Heaven and earth are full of your glory, Hosanna in the highest. Hosanna in the highest.
Blessed is he who comes in the name of the Lord. Blessed is he who comes in the name of the Lord. Hosanna, hosanna, in the highest, in the highest.
